mapper.insert: insert into alg_auth_code (acd_sn, usr_sn, acd_name, acd_id, call_from_client, call_from_browser, restrict_url, data_use_type ,create_date) values (#{acdSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callFromClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callFromBrowser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{restrictUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataUseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update alg_auth_code set usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acd_name = #{acdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acd_id = #{acdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_from_client = #{callFromClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_from_browser = #{callFromBrowser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, restrict_url = #{restrictUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_use_type = #{dataUseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where acd_sn = #{acdSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select acd_sn, usr_sn, acd_name, acd_id, call_from_client, call_from_browser, restrict_url, data_use_type ,create_date from alg_auth_code where acd_sn = #{acdSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
